title: Add gold and silver hexagonal background pattern to home and product pages

requirements.text: Apply a gold and silver hexagonal background pattern to the home page that covers the entire page background

quotes: change the layout of both pages into a gold and silver in hexagonal pattern

acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays a repeating hexagonal pattern in gold and silver colors as the background
Background pattern is visible behind all existing content
Pattern maintains visual consistency with the warm earth-tone color scheme

requirements.text: Apply the same gold and silver hexagonal background pattern to the product management admin page (AdminDashboard)

quotes: change the layout of both pages into a gold and silver in hexagonal pattern

acceptanceCriteria: Product management page displays the same repeating hexagonal pattern as the home page
Background pattern is visible behind the product form and product list
Pattern does not interfere with readability of forms or product information

constraints: Do not modify the existing product search functionality on the home page
Do not modify the existing add/edit/delete product form functionality
Preserve the current warm earth-tone color scheme while adding the hexagonal pattern
Background pattern must not negatively impact text readability or UI component visibility
nonGoals: Changing the hexagonal pattern on other pages beyond home and product management
Modifying product data structure or backend logic
Changing form validation or submission logic
